description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. "Edgeland: Trials of a lost circle" is a fast-paced, quick reflex platform game where you have to travel through the dangerous Edgeland to get back home to Circlia before it all goes square-shaped.
description.short: "Edgeland: Trials of a lost circle" is a fast-paced, quick reflex platform game where you have to travel through the dangerous Edgeland to get back home to Circlia before it all goes square-shaped.
